hero.subheadline: Decision Trail helps you capture everyday decisions, changes, and incidents — and reason about their potential ISMS impact before they escalate.

problem.title: Most ISMS issues don't start as incidents.
problem.conclusion: Without a clear trail of reasoning, these decisions become hard to explain — especially later, during reviews or audits.

whatItDoes.title: Decision Trail creates a reasoning trail, not just a log.
whatItDoes.subtitle: Every decision leaves a trace. Decision Trail helps you make that trace meaningful, structured, and ready for when it matters most.

item1.title: Capture in real-time
item1.description: Log decisions, changes, and near-misses as they happen — before context is lost.

item2.title: AI-assisted reasoning
item2.description: Get help identifying potential ISMS impact areas and asking the right questions.

item3.title: Auditable by design
item3.description: Keep a clear trail of why something was decided — ready for reviews and audits.

item4.title: Human in control
item4.description: Nothing is automatic. You review, adjust, and decide what gets documented.

step1.title: Describe what happened
step1.description: Write a short, free-text description of a decision or event.

step2.title: Get guided reasoning
step2.description: The AI helps you rephrase the situation, ask the right questions, and highlight areas that may require attention.

step3.title: Decide and document
step3.description: You stay in control. Review, adjust, and save the reasoning trail.

whoFor.title: Who Decision Trail is for
whoFor.conclusion: If you are responsible for decisions that may impact security or compliance, Decision Trail fits naturally into your workflow.

whatItIsNot.title: What Decision Trail is not
whatItIsNot.item3: Not a replacement for human judgment
whatItIsNot.conclusion: Decision Trail supports thinking — it does not replace responsibility.

earlyStage.text: Decision Trail is currently in early access and evolving through real-world use and feedback.
